评论概述: Cute, flowy top if you get one size up!
评论详情: After reading reviews I decided to order this top in a size Large even though I usually wear a Medium in loose tops. For reference, I'm a 36 C/D depending on the bra. This top fits slightly more loosely than I had expected out of the box, but the tag says 65% cotton so I am glad its slightly loose in case of shrinkage. It's a darling top, you can keep it conservative by buttoning it up fully, or have a little fun showing off the girls by leaving the buttons undone! I'll definitely be ordering this in other colors and might try a Medium if I lose the last 10 pounds I am trying to shed. Overall, I'd recommend getting a size larger than you think you need of you want it to be loose and flowy!
It is much more flattering on me than I thought it would be.  I how it flows and the softness of the fabric.  Looking to buy another one, different color.

评论概述: Why do most sleeveless tops show bra straps?
评论详情: Fit around armholes is very sloppy and reminds me of Walmart goods! I ordered a medium and it fits except for the armholes. This is a horribly made top. Guess I’m stuck with it. Living in Taiwan it would cost as much to send it back as I paid for the top! Live and learn!

I have purchased several of these tops and really like them. In this case, the colors seem to be relatively close to the photo but computer monitors vary. This one has a sort of burnt orange, salmon, and turquoise colors. The fabric is poly cotton and very soft. The tag recommends hand washing or dry cleaning. One I purchased last year pilled because I washed/dried it in my HE equipment. I think the pilling happened in the dryer as the delicate cycle in my HE washer is akin to hand washing and I safely wash all kinds of delicates in it. The fabric is light and airy, nice for hot weather (or if you suffer with hot flashes!) The new ones I just purchased I will hang dry. I am 5'7", 140 pounds with a 30-year baby bulge and I find these tops very flattering. I always come back for more when my budget budget allows. I will try to post photos soon.
I have worn this shirt and like it very much.  I like how it fits under the arms so no bra is showing.
